EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Customer when Lead is created
EmailTemplate.name: RetailSMB_LeadCreated_Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Australia Post
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in our products and services.
An enquiry has been raised on your behalf. Your reference number is {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}.
We will respond to your enquiry shortly.
Thank you,
Australia Post
